item.title: Tech billionaires' ramp up bets on AI, biotech

item.title: Coffee and ‘chili crab’ ice cream: How luxury fashion brands like Coach are capturing Asian consumers

item.title: How the world’s 240,000 crypto millionaires are spending their fortunes
item.description: There are now an estimated 241,700 individuals with crypto holdings worth $1 million or more, up 40% from last year, according to new data.

item.title: Ferrari shares down 13% on fears of slowdown
